headline.main: PANEL CITES GAINS IN HEALTH DRIVE; More High Blood Pressure Cases Are Being Treated

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr. Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 19 National efforts to make Americans alert to the dangers of high blood pressure seem to be proving effective, specialists said today.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 19 National efforts to make Americans alert to the dangers of high blood pressure seem to be proving effective, specialists said today.
